personal_summary: I am a student passionate about solving problems and exploring innovative solutions. With expertise in programming, data analysis, and cloud technologies, I strive to tackle challenging problems and make a positive impact through technology.
strengths: Critical Thinking: Analyzing problems deeply and devising innovative solutions.
Adaptability: Thriving in dynamic environments and embracing new challenges.
Leadership: Leading teams effectively and fostering collaboration for successful outcomes.

education.institution: University at Buffalo, The State University of New York
education.degree: Master of Science in Computer Science (MSCS)

education.institution: Mumbai University, Vidyalankar Institute Of Technology (VIT)
education.degree: Bachelor of Engineering in Computer Engineering

certifications: NVIDIA: Building Real-Time Video AI Applications

responsibilities: Implemented a FastAPI-driven backend for a chat application integrating Azure OpenAI.
Developed asynchronous web scraping solutions using Python and FastAPI.
Optimized MongoDB database interactions for chat histories.
Enhanced user flow and scalability of a web-based chat application.
Conducting research under Dr. Chen Wang focusing on Gaussian Splatting for advanced rendering techniques.
Developing methodologies to improve the efficiency and quality of rendering processes.
Developed VIT Internship Portal for managing application processes.
Created an efficient backend system using Flask and SQLite.
Deployed the project on Azure leveraging multiple services.

projects.title: Auto Envision
projects.description: Completed sales forecasting using ARIMA, LSTM, and FB Prophet. Led data cleaning for a dataset of 100,000+ rows, achieving 95% accuracy with FB Prophet.

projects.title: Car Price EDA
projects.description: Performed in-depth EDA on a car price dataset with 11,900 rows and 16 columns. Used Matplotlib and Seaborn for data visualization, enabling data-driven decision-making.

projects.title: Flying Cubes
projects.description: Developed an AR application allowing real-time manipulation of ascending cubes. Demonstrated Unity and AR proficiency with engaging user interactions.

projects.title: Coinee
projects.description: Built a Flutter-based coin collection app showcasing 300+ rare coins from 15+ countries. Integrated features like a quiz and coin value calculator.
projects.short_description: A coin collection app with rare coins & quizzes.

projects.title: Workerâ€™s Application
projects.description: Streamlined the hiring of service workers with a Kotlin-based app. Features included worker profiles, real-time updates, and secure database storage.

projects.title: Novel Chatbot
projects.description: Built a chatbot for novel-specific and general user queries. Processed novel texts, trained a Random Forest classifier, and integrated Hugging Face APIs, deployed on GCP.

projects.title: Road Extraction From Satellite Images
projects.description: Engineered a fusion approach combining ResNet50 and VGG models for road extraction. Achieved 95.3% validation accuracy using UNet modeling and data augmentation.

projects.title: Language Translation Enhancement
projects.description: Developed an English-to-French translation system using Google T5 and Facebook M2M-100. Achieved a METEOR score of 0.109 and deployed it on Gradio for real-time interaction.

publications.title: Car Sales Forecasting Using ML Time Series Algorithm
